name: Unreal (1990)
description: Unreal is a 1990 video game released by Ubisoft for the Amiga. The game, divided in 8 chapters, combined two different genres: In five levels, the player controls a pterodactyl-like creature in a pseudo-3D rail shooter environment. Three levels belong to the side-scrolling platform game genre where the player controls a barbarian fighting monsters and solving puzzles. Ports for MS-DOS and Atari ST were released in 1991.
